'''Task name:''' Sending email

'''Description:''' Test the ability for different users groups to compose and send email using ''Evolution''.

'''Procedure:'''
* Start ''evolution'' from the task bar and or the Applications menu
** Ideally this should be done on a fresh user account so you can go through the initial setup wizard
* Select <code>Compose new message</code> from the toolbar or the Message menu.
* Enter a recipient and a subject
* Type some text and send 

'''Comments:'''
* Please include the release you are testing with in your comment. Include your launchpad ID at the end of your comments:
** Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
** Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID.
